website_summaries.verdict: The MSI's first-class memory will impress gamers and non-gamers alike.
pros: Even though this MSI doesn't include an SSD, the 16 gigabytes of Intel Optane Memory compensates well
The Steelseries keyboard comes with an optional red backlight, and the keys are big for easy typing
cons: Some users complain about the unusual keyboard layout and short battery life

customer_reviews.title: BUY. THIS. LAPTOP. NAOOWWW!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop! So many functions for gamers. I got the 8th gen i5, but honestly it's still better than the 7th gen i7. I was a bit concerned about the 5400rpm 1TB drive, but the Optane totally takes care of the data transfer lag! Add in a heat flush button, awesome styling, and perfectly placed buttons and this thing rocks. I can play every game I've wanted to and almost all of them on full settings. It's light and durable and has enough inputs to go with anything. Best laptop I've had in a decade!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kim

customer_reviews.title: this thing runs super smooth. This is definitely a great budget gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: I gotta tell you, i had my doubts on this computer going into it but i have never been more wrong. The computer is lightning fast with the 8th gen 15 (runs faster that a 7th gen i7) and after getting all the updated completed, this thing runs super smooth. This is definitely a great budget gaming laptop and amazing workstation laptop for those of you that want the best of both worlds. Strongly recommend the 8th gen i5 version of this computer! It looks super nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Ookami

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work black screen out of the box. Constant blue screen crashes and system failures. Was never able to play a game or do any work on this laptop because I spent a day trying to figure out if this laptop was salvageable or not and turns out it’s completely useless. Returning this product now. They offer a free gaming headset if you leave a positive review so don’t trust all the five star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: This is my second laptop. It is apparent the hard drive has failed yet AGAIN. Upon accepting a graphics driver update, the whole laptop froze. After 30 minutes, the laptop was forced to reboot and all that came up was a blank screen with an arrow and a flashing circular icon. This laptop isn't even 30 days old yet. DON'T buy this piece of junk. I've never owned an MSI laptop and if I can help it, this one is going back and I will never own one again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to upgrade my old HP laptop that was about 10 years old (yes I know) but hey it had a good life. Well a lot has changed in that time and my use for a lap top has changed too. I wanted a pc that I could use for every day tasks and game. I did my research and after my boyfriend built his computer with MSI parts and seeing how amazing and solid his build was. I compared MSI lap tops and HPs. MSI definitely took the win with the specs and the price points. Boots up and runs games and everyday task like smooth jazz. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nattynatm

customer_reviews.title: Optane doesn't always play well with MSI laptops.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple System crashes...wouldn't restore. Sent first one back for replacement. Second one lasted 3 days before failing..same thing. Since my son needed a reliable machine for school. I did massive research and pinpointed the optane memory as the issue. Replaced the 16gig optane with a 128gig Patriot Scorch NVME m2 ssd drive and system has been solid ever since. Note: this may void your warranty and is a very involved operation for the uninitiated.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger

customer_reviews.title: 2 Months - Computer is in the SHOP!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this computer because it came highly recommended.. BUT let me NOT recommend it. I've had this computer for 2 months and it's currently in the shop. Was installing an update and the computer went black. Computer shop says the operating system needs to be reinstalled and MSI says they don't cover it under their warranty.... common, 2 months.. the computer is NEW! Knew I should have stuck with Apple!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gaming laptop with great build quality! Got this for my wife whom will use it mostly for engineering work. She loves the look and feel of the keyboard! If there are any issues handling 3D rendering, we will upgrade the ram, no biggy. So far so good though! Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Collin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy MSI products
customer_reviews.text: How can I put this accurately? Umm. I wouldn't recommend MSI products to a 3rd world country. Ever since buying my 15 inch $900 chunk of MSI crap I have had to wipe it to factory settings 3 times. Only to find out it had a bad Hard Drive 5 months into use. the 3rd time I wiped it, permanently put it out of use. While MSI tech support, which I can barely get ahold of tells me he will send me an email with send back and repair info. In which he did not. so I'm busy missing school work because I trusted MSI with almost $1,000 dollars worth of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Beason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer is AMAZING! It’s a very fast laptop. I use it for gaming and it runs rocket league at MAX graphics and it looks amazing! I definitely recommend this if you are looking for a good gaming laptop. ***EDIT*** This computer is being sent back...it started acting buggy after about one week. I would *not* recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a computer that needs you to work on it.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is not building with the specs that it said. The main pieces of the hardware that said it is "NVue ssd" but in reality it has a different harddrive. Toomany problems with the hardware. The connections between the harddrive and the motherboard are so bad that at any touch they disconnected and connected making the computer corrupt the harddrive. First if you have this computer check and secure the all the with the motherboard if not you will have more than an a simple hhd or ssd problem.
customer_reviews.author: luis sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop! it's great for gaming, and runs things fast thanks to the Intel Optain. Its a fun Laptap I've been gaming with it fine for almost a month now, but this morning I woke up and it's now "repairing disc errors" when it was running smoothly last night. Hopefully this is a one of thing. Edit: a few minutes after posting this the repair was done, and after a couple reboots it works fine again! :) it's been about 2 weeks or so, since the problem and I haven't had anymore problems.:)
customer_reviews.author: W. Barbour

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased initially with this computer. It looks sick. Upon configuration there are several high notes to it. How easy and quick it was to get everything up to speed on it. Gaming was above average. With time passing however, a few problems that i would ignore in a 3+ yr computer started happening after only 6-8 months, namely: Battery: Computer does not hold a charge CPU/Boot: Problems booting up due to above. If the computer does not remain plugged, logging in takes over 25 minutes. Restore: I had to restore memory twice within a year. Overall: Ok computer. I wish i would have saved some money going cheaper or similar price with a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Syzokel (Itacv2)

customer_reviews.title: Brighter screen than Helios 300
customer_reviews.text: Quite like this laptop so far, only writing this review so early from owning it to receive that nice MSI headset. It has a brighter screen than Acer's H300 as well as better ventilation (albeit, much less power). The touchpad isn't the best I've used nor is it the worst. 4/5 stars seems appropriate for this unit. Edit: Update to my initial impressions. Crashes sometimes and locks on black screen. Additionally, I never received the steelseries siberia headset after a seemingly fine entry. Not too happy with MSI, likely to return this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Boggy G.

customer_reviews.title: Really great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mid-range gaming laptop. The optane makes booting lightning fast, the Processor/RAM/GPU combo is good. It's not the most powerful machine on the market but for the price it's very good! Build quality is good, it feels sturdy and well made, it does run slightly hot under stress, but also has a fan overdrive hardware button so you can purge the hot air. The only thing I don't like is the bezels around the screen, and the adhesive for the stickers. Other than that, I would highly recommend this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: sapphinfection

customer_reviews.title: Pay more money for something better. This is the most expensive turd I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Over all a bad laptop. Fans are very loud and rattle within a week of purchasing. Very slow and cant handle simple stuff. Very bad battery life even on power saver mode and lowest brightness setting. It will only successfully start every other time I turn it on. It cannot go into stand by otherwise the screen will stay black and a force shut down is the only option. Has trouble handling a simple solid works assembly, runs average with video games. It can't handle garrys mod single player.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Ferari

customer_reviews.title: Optane Memory Failure after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I think that the Optane memory has burned out. This is also what the Support at MSI has told me. I am in the middle of taking it out and installing windows without the optane. My hope is that since it is 1st generation optane the flaws have been fixed. The mouse pad is clocking at 96 degrees F on the surface. It was a decent laptop for my son until this point. He had it on doing school work. Went to lunch and came back to the blue screen of death. It's not my first rodeo, so I hope I can repair it. It's unfortunate that so many people have had problems with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth any price.
customer_reviews.text: Never again. This laptop has been nothing but trouble. The CPU always runs hot, the headphone/mic jacks never worked. It is one of the slowest computers I have ever owned. HDMI out to a second monitor is failing even though it never moves from my desk. It barely works for gaming on with games that are 4 years old and running low graphics. The keys are terrible to see and the red back light makes it worse. The lack of USB ports is painful. I have never been so unhappy with a computer and I've only had it for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ballantyne9k

customer_reviews.title: Laptop kept crashing multiple times after one month and crashed completely after one year.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was going to replace an older laptop, however, this model has brought nothing but problems after one month of use. The laptop worked well in the first month but on the second month, the operating system kept crashing sporadically. After continuous crashes, returned to using the older laptop. When older laptop finally reached its last leg, started using this laptop again. Again, the operating system kept crashing. And then in late 2019, the laptop completely crashed. Tried everything to restore the laptop to its original factory settings. Nothing worked. Reached out to MSI support via email and was told to call the support line to request a recovery disk but it is not free.
customer_reviews.author: Collector3000

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this LT for my son in December. About a week ago it slowed to a crawl and ultimately stopped working. I took it to a computer repair shop and the diagnosis is that the Hard Drive is toast and needs to be replaced. I understand that this isn't a very expensive machine but I did expect it to last more than 5 months. I am stuck with it now and have no choice but to repair it. Hopefully the repair will work. Look elsewhere you will be disappointed with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Having issues since purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in August and have had issues since day one. The laptop is powerful and will do whatever you need a laptop to do. However, anytime this thing goes to sleep it does not wake up. I've tried changing all the settings and even turning sleep/hibernate off. Every occurrence requires a hard reset. This week I experienced two disk errors and on the second the laptop was unable to recover from the error. I'm currently restoring the laptop back to factory settings (again). So far this laptop has only been used for school work and some light gaming. I'm disappointed that I'm disappointed with the laptop, knowing what I know now, I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for gaming/streaming and every day home use. I've been able to game with settings maxed, no problem. I also use it to stream on twitch from my console. It's more lightweight than I thought it would be. The keyboard is one of the nicest I've used on a laptop. The lit keyboard wasn't something I thought I needed until I had it. Great feature. Has all the output/inputs you would want and need for gaming. The screen is a good size. Not too big or too small. Clean crisp picture. You can't beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking and fast laptop if only if it would stop crashing
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking and fast laptop if only if it would stop crashing and having to reset back to default settings. I also have the black screen issue some were saying (screen won’t wake up from sleep) Returning it and may or may not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent Me A Defective Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more disappointed...so glad I didn't wait until Christmas..called tech support and this lap top had no memory...sending it back...tech support said it was probably used..
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Machine... runs great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great! The graphics on my games look great. I opened the box and spun up the machine and it was running perfectly right out of the box. Within an hour I had already set it up the way I wanted it and was playing Diablo III. The screen is beautiful and the LED backlit keys are gorgeous. The casing is solid and feels very durable. The Optane Memory picks up on your commonly used apps and behaves like an SSD. I am very satisfied and for the price point, this machine and its specs cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming and the money BUT
customer_reviews.text: For the price I got of 600$ it is unbeatable power. Butttttt the speakers are actual garbage the track pad is not accurate but fine cuz wireless mouse is how you game. And*** if you are doing homework and typing of a long time the keyboard starts typing random keys. My model did at least about after 15 min of typing my paper it just started typing and had to restart the computer to make it stop. Happens every time.
customer_reviews.author: Gindi F.

customer_reviews.title: slow,bloated, overheats and just overall not good
customer_reviews.text: Note that this laptop is only 45 daysish old. If i Could get my money back on this thing i would (still trying). Half the time i cant even get the screen to come up with windows. (black screen of death) with back-light on. Playing games on this looks like garbage. Customer support is even worse, good luck getting a hold of anyone that knows what they are talking about. Will never buy MSI again.
customer_reviews.author: Cory smith

customer_reviews.title: Great performer except
customer_reviews.text: the speakers are seriously lacking! I have played with this for a few hours now and it is really a great deal, works great for gaming, can run most games on ultra or high. however the speakers at max volume are about as loud as iphone 7 at 40-50% volume. at this volume unless your in a library its a waste of hardware to have speakers this weak. get some good headphones or external speakers for this. I would have rated 5 stars but with speakers like this, a one star penalty was simply not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Masters

customer_reviews.title: Decent laptop for the $$, but audio is bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent laptop for the price, but the audio is VERY lacking. I had to buy a 3rd party program to make remotely usable. Also, the build isn't what I had expected from MSI. It's very "palsticy" and the "lid" and/or the "base" plastic separates easily at the seams. Not a good hting, inmo. The battery life is just 2 hours on mine so...not sure what battery everyone else has. I want theirs! LOL. Again, for the price, not bad, but not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I take this laptop to every studio I go to and it literally sets the mood in the dark with the led keyboard, crazy how in comparison to my old razor which was a $1,500 bugged out but the msi has been doing amazing I originally got it as a short term laptop but I’m going to keep it and not invest in another razor. The fan keeps it cool, and it seems to run quite fast with 64 bit plugins all running big ones too such as a bunch of kontacts and omnisphears opened up. Great laptop Only thing I dislike is the color is only one but I guess I could’ve spent a few hundred more
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing buy problems with this laptop since the day I got it. Wireless didn't work out of the box, audio went out 2 weeks later, and other minor to major issues. 2 days ago it finally had a ram error and then couldn't even boot into windows. Nothing but problems, buy literally any other brand of laptop. Also their customer service is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine for gaming & casual entertainment use.
customer_reviews.text: The product was shipped & delivered promptly and without issue, and everything functioned as it should out of the box with no problems. I'm satisfied with the build quality and it's a far more reasonable weight compared to other gaming laptops I've owned, which makes it far less cumbersome to lug around. The battery life when unplugged is only a few hours but such is to be expected from a laptop like this, and most gamers buying it will likely be using it while it's plugged in. The long term durability & reliability remains to be seen, but nothing seems especially fragile or prone to breakage thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, and Fast
customer_reviews.text: Plays Arma 3 very well on high settings, even on a big server (50+). Optane really makes a difference in the load times. Feels like I have an SSD for in there. The 1050ti will handle just about anything out there at the moment, and I am very impressed with the i5 8300H. Great portable gaming solution. The only problem is the hard drive is split into two partitions for some reason, but that won't be an issue until I get close to filling the main partition. Battery life is better than I expected, but performance drops fairly hard when it is unplugged. This is more like a portable Gaming PC than a laptop in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: No Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking laptop, but it is pretty big so be prepared for that. The battery life however is AWFUL. It barely lasts for 2 hours unplugged, so if you dont mind sitting right next to an outlet with a giant cable attached to your computer all the time, you'll be fine. After less than a month of use, the screen stopped working as well, so I sent it in for repair. The repair was quick, but even with a brand new battery, there is still an incredibly short battery life. Honestly not worth the money if you're looking for a decent gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: MSI stands for Major Scammers International
customer_reviews.text: Trash product, died within a couple of months of purchase. I had it sitting in one place like a desktop for 2 months and the second I move it to bring it to a friends house it breaks down like a pregnant lady who just found out the buffet is out of fried pickles. If I can even just convince 1 person not to make the mistake I did and buy this awful piece of shit I'll have done my duty. Stay away from this, stay away from MSIs in general while you're at it. Better off with a stick and hoop because at least you know those wont break for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Victory

customer_reviews.title: Good for its price
customer_reviews.text: Very good for back and forth between school, and gaming between classes or when I don’t feel like hopping on my desktop. The price is a bit steep considering the specs, but unfortunately thats what you’ll come across when looking for laptops. The overall quality is great, and I can run games like Overwatch, Sunset Overdrive, GTA 5, Fallout 4, and obviously Minecraft at Maximum, if not near maximum settings with little frame drop.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Windows Error = Unable to use laptop at all
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I booted up the laptop, I got a message saying "The computer restarted unexpectedly or encountered an unexpected error. Windows installation cannot proceed. To install Windows, click "OK" to restart the computer, and then restart the installation." I tried both pressing OK as well as exiting out of the message window but both lead to the same screen with the same message.
customer_reviews.author: Ckim

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with the laptop Keyboard has a nice and clean feel. The keys have a slight click sound but nothing like a mechanical keyboard. the keys are a bit bouncy but feel good. Screen is great, it's not IPS but it does have good colors and the refresh rate is 60hz Sound is decent but can't ask for more in this price range All in all we will recommend the MSI GV62 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support is non-existent
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my kids (high school age). One works fine with minimal interruption. The other dies, constantly. Blue screen death. Reformat and lose everything constantly. When it runs, it is hot, constantly. Windows update that gets to 80% and stops. Yes, constantly. Support is zero help, and the "extended warranty" is laughable. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tmil

customer_reviews.title: Real Person
customer_reviews.text: Computer looks and feels great. Many people have talked about it being slow and I will admit it was at first but seems to have gotten faster as it has been broken in. First one did not arrive with Windows on it, but Amazon and MSI cleared that up and had a new one shipped just to make sure there was nothing else wrong with it. Overall good computer GF uses it for video editing and web design
customer_reviews.author: Sean T.

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've had to do a factory reset on this piece of garbage 4 times and I've only owned it for 4 months. I use it sparingly; maybe once or twice a week for casual gaming, such as Blizzard games (which are relatively low intensity games to run). Yet this laptop manages to find new and creative ways to crash every 30 days or so. And MSI customer service is absolutely useless. Definitely regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joey S

customer_reviews.title: I agree...buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased an ASUS gaming laptop from IBUYPOWER but it was Dead on Arrival and they didn't have much else in the same price point. So after a little research I came upon this little jewel. It does what it says and it does it right. This was a gift for my wife and she is still amazed at how fast it is and how bright the back lit keyboard is. Shoulda bought MSI from the get go. This model the MSI GV62 8RD-200, is a powerhouse for gaming and intense video editing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great tech support, but some issues persist with this model
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is pretty good, very fast startup and looks sleek. However for me I've had several issues that required replacements. The wifi driver would inexplicably stop working (requiring a reinstall), or the sound would cut out for no reason (that also required a driver reinstall). The first laptop I got had a battery issue where it wouldn't charge properly, requiring a replacement. The customer service is good though. Overall, I figure since I spent around 1k for a laptop, it should be easy to use and be reliable. But it's unfortunately hasn't been the case. The battery life is pretty short (2-3 hours), but I knew that before I bought it based on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ye

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for PUBG and Fortnite if it doesn't crash on you.
customer_reviews.text: Update after 6 months. Dropped to one star after it crashing again. Twice on the original drive and now twice on the new ssd drive. It won't see Windows,restore or repair. Basically I love everything and have to reinstall Windows from scratch. It is nightmare each time and takes several hours to rebuild everything back. It works great when it is working right. Runs PUBG and forty on high settings at 30fps.
customer_reviews.author: Sidesalto

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically for playing ff14. At max settings it runs 107 fps and doesn't slow down, and hasn't had a single issue since installation. Windows ten is a nag, and it came installed with Norton which was unpaid and basically harassment ware imho, but otherwise a beast at the cost. Yes, you could build a pc that would be slightly better for the cost, but you'd also have to do the work as opposed to it coming in a box in a single day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanne Donelson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The description says that this has a 1TB hard drive; unless 1TB is less than 300GB then it does not have a 1TB hard drive. it comes with a 256GB hard drive. VERY DISAPPOINTED! ***Update*** this laptop has already bit the dust; it crashed with a blue screen of death, and then refused to power back on. Very, very disappointed. ***Update #2*** 2nd replacement laptop has just died, I believe that this is a horrible lemon of a computer; I bought the 4 year replacement warranty, hopefully I don't have 4 years of having to deal with replacing this system every couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Would not boot into an OS out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked that the laptop had issues out of the box. I was sad that I had to return the item. For the most part MSI makes an OK product. I could have installed the OS myself, but for the price i did not feel i should. Also this device feels like a boat anchor , so if you plan on commuting with it don't.
customer_reviews.author: emeritek

customer_reviews.title: Bloatware and hardware issues
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the worst purchases of laptops I have ever made. The hard disk comes with some pretty substantial bloatware and extra partitions that basically prevent it from actually activating windows. The windows installation is faulty, and causes kernel errors, as well as getting stuck in a "repair hard disk loop." What was even worse was the customer service. It has a "warranty" but it is impossible to prove that anything is wrong with it. Purchased it the first time, thought it was faulty hardware, returned for a replacement of the exact same, and it had the exact problems. My solution? Boot Linux from a USB and reformat the HD and install Linux overtop of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Good Gaming Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop in order to be able to run Autocad. Having it be a fast and powerful gaming laptop is just a plus! I love the back lite keyboard. Not a fan of laptop keyboard, but this one is pretty good. This machine boots up fast and so far I have no issues or concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Jasonamf

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is well made, and works well with the various games my 12 year old son plays online. He has downloaded League of Legends, Terrarria, and a few others. They all seems to perform very well on this Machine and the graphics looks equally nice. We are pleased with the performance, and the overall gaming experience of this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfish_b

customer_reviews.title: A pretty decent gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This thing boots up like a breeze. Only takes a matter of seconds. The fans are great, and the fan boost button is great for flushing out heat. With that being said this bad boy never overheats. Ive only played tf2 and skullgirls on it. But for the most part i can say it perfoms pretty well. Id say the only downside is the short battery, but from what i heard, that's a common occurrence in gaming notebooks. If you have the money for a better option, go for it. But if you wanna save a few bucks and still get something decent for 800 bucks, this laptop is great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Loud speakers, surprisingly fast, medium settings gaming
customer_reviews.text: I followed along with the reviews and they didn't disappoint! Everyone speaks the truth about this laptop. I tested it with forza horizon 3 with a steering wheel attached. It was able to play on medium settings with minimum lag. Laptop starts up surprisingly fast for a computer without a SSD hardrive. Speakers are surprisingly loud as well! I would definitely buy this laptop if you're in the market for decent lower tier gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Excelente Product.
customer_reviews.text: The package came in perfect condition. Intel optane memory helps you load the system very quickly, it really helps. So far I am very satisfied with the computer. I use it with programs like AutoCad Civil 3D and it responds very well. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Edduyn

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy setup, and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Received this laptop within 2 days with prime shipping, used this laptop for 9 days now, played several games such as LFD2, Dota2, CSGO, Rainbow Siege. All games rendered well with high level settings. Cons of this laptop are the battery life and the loud noise from the fan, shouldnt be an issue if you are more concerned towards the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Friendlysin

customer_reviews.title: Total Trash, stay away. If you purchased, return it ASAP - it will fail
customer_reviews.text: Black screen of death, only boots intermittently. I got OK function for about a month but poor screen quality and subpar sound. Basically a $800 paper weight. There should be a recall. Don't get trapped with this laptop. Google it, ton and tons of issues. Do not buy, if you already own one return it before your warranty runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous1234

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely stay away from this one
customer_reviews.text: First one died had a dead line on the screen. Sent it back. The second one died after a couple months. Sent it in for repair and they fixed it. A few months later, it freezes for several minutes on startup. Nothing we tried worked (repair options, factory reset, etc). Biggest waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Codr9

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: After looking up and doing some initial tweaks to bloatware, which wasn't actually bad, this computer is running like a dream. Display is beautiful, startup time from restart or complete power down is very snappy. The keyboard isn't spongy nor is it to hard, it feels really good. The ambient red backlighting on the keyboard is very nice too. Everything lights up very well, and its easy on the eyes during the night. So far i've ran a few games and everything seems to be running very smoothe 50-70fps on games such as Skyrim and Witcher 3. I haven't even upgraded the ram yet and im impressed. 5/5 would recommend if you're looking for more of a budget gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Great entry gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced for those who want a entry level gaming laptop. Sleek design and solid build. The finish will leave fingerprints, but nothing that a microfiber won't take off. Cooler boost fans are definitely welcome to keep it cool, but can be a bit loud. Nothing to cry about imo. Runs the bulk of games on high with no little to problems. Overall, happy with the purchase and would recommend for those who are new to PC gaming and those who don't want to build their own rig and don't want to break the bank
customer_reviews.author: Holland c

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for budget gaming
customer_reviews.text: Amazing performance with gtx1050ti, and intel optane provides very fast boot up. 8th generation i5 is able to support most recent games without any problem. Hardware wise this laptop is definitely worth the money. Only con is that laptop body is mainly plastic, there's no metal. I would expect to have some brushed aluminium finish for a premium feeling. There's many laptops under 500$ with metal finish. I think MSI could have done a better job with a body design. But as I said in the beginning performance wise it's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vamsi M

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: In love with this new laptop. The keyboard feels smooth and it loads the games I want to play and it's overall faster than my old laptop. Would definitely recommend considering it was recommended to me and I am not disappointed. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: The most inconsistent notebook I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Buy this if you like a mediocre display, constant windows errors and tech support with 0 empathy. The first and last time I buy MSI. Just very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: A G.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: The computer was a 50-50 chance to boot from day one, but we figured it needed to run updates and get settled. Seemed fine, loaded our photos and docs to it, and that was the last time we saw a desktop. Repair failed. Reset locked up on 1%. This thing is a paperweight, and I'm absolutely disgusted with it. This was a Christmas present and now we're scrambling because it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Chirurgen

customer_reviews.title: New Computer
customer_reviews.text: It's been about 10 years since I've bought a new notebook. This computer has great all around performance and resolution. It's not too heavy or bulky so it's a great option if you're looking to be mobile. The keyboard looks really cool to with the red background lighting. This is a great all around laptop for both casual use and running programs like PS and 3ds Max for my school projects.
customer_reviews.author: Shanshan

customer_reviews.title: Decent laptop
customer_reviews.text: good for quick gaming(counterstrike), game starts lagging when linked to Bluetooth speaker. Had the system for less then a year, don't really use it much and surprised the harddrive went put on me...Did'nt feel like dealing with the tech so i just ordered a new Samsung harddrive to replace....I don't see how it would just go out like that with the little amount of use...
customer_reviews.author: thanh

customer_reviews.title: very good laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is way better than my old toshiba laptop it faster more quiet and the sound is even better. At first i was skeptical considering this laptop was only $799 but when it got here i was surprised, love the red back lit keyboard, the color of the screen is great, and its speed is off the charts i recommend this laptop to who evers in the market for a decent price high quality laptop. It also has plenty of usb ports to connect whatever you need, also the battery is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: system appears to pause, long wait time waiting...
customer_reviews.text: had purchase this for my child to surf the net; I'd noticed (and I can easily reproduce the problem), whenever her game needs to download an update, it seems like no data is coming down, while the harddrive activity (read and write) is very high. Then after a long long pause, it continues to download. then shortly another long pause while the laptop is writing. I placed it next to my 3 year old Alienware 13, and mine does not do this. We're have FIOS, so it's not the internet connection. now I feel bad buying this for my child, as this laptop seem to have a solid rating elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: L. Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! I should have paid closer attention to the negative reviews. I had the same issues many others have stated. The laptop was dead on arrival. No operating system installed, no recovery disk, no ‘MSI F3 Recovery’ option. Just a blue screen of death and constant boot looping. Absolutely terrible quality control to not even get past the initial boot. I will never own another MSI product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Laptop For Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming laptop and it was recommended to me by a friend and I'm glad that he did! I like how nice it looks but also how it performs as well. It is able to stay very cool, but the fan sometimes gets loud but not too loud where you can not hear anything. All the games that have been playing (Overwatch, LOL, and Warframe ) have all ran at a smooth 60 Fps. I would recommend this laptop for anyone that is looking for a affordable laptop that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Thien

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Just reinstall windows when you get the laptop. Laptop itself is nice. Pretty good key caps, I like the button dedicated to turning the fans full blast to cool the laptop faster, but the fans are loud because of it. Laptop does stay cool in general though.
customer_reviews.author: worm

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall Laptop
customer_reviews.text: The MSI GV62 laptop has great all around performance and resolution. The RAM is sufficient for games like Fortnite on medium settings, while also being able to easily browse websites like Youtube while game downloads are in progress. It's not too heavy or bulky so a great option if you're looking to be very mobile. The keyboard has very responsive and comfortable. However, I will have to contact Amazon about the other 8 GB of RAM. As advertised, it's 16 GB Optane RAM, however the system reads this as only 8 GB. That's why 4 stars. Hope to get this settled soon. Otherwise, this is a great all around laptop for both gaming and casual use.
customer_reviews.author: amazshopper

customer_reviews.title: Screen looks very washed out.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has good hardware specs, but the screen has very poor color coverage: 59%. As a result, everything has a washed out, whiteish tint. I haven't seen a screen with this dull of colors before, and I thought something might be wrong, so I played around with different preset settings, and even calibrated the colors, but I wasn't able to achieve more vibrant colors, just darker colors, which make it difficult to see dark images. I eventually opted for the MSI GL62M instead of this laptop because the colors look much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to replace her old computer. She loves playing video games and doing other stuff online. This computer she loves, she can play her games, have a ton of tabs open and running on her browser and many other things going at the same time without slowing down it at all. It boots up extremely fast which suits her needs perfectly. only drawback is the lack of a disc drive but luckily we had portable drive we can use to install with when needed.
customer_reviews.author: michael kasper

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and an all-around good gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop because I was looking for a cheap but sturdy gaming laptop under $1000 and have not been disappointed! This laptop runs well and tends to be on the quieter side. It was lighter than expected. My biggest complaint would be the battery life which isn't terribly long and made even less so when playing games. I would definitely recommend this laptop as a cheap but high quality gaming laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to upgrade my laptop and was looking to indulge some gaming. This caught my eye as it was on sale. I've only had it for a week but I am satisfied so far. -runs the games I want just fine on high settings -it's fast -not much bloatware The battery drains quick when gaming but I always game plugged-in. Doing everyday stuff, the battery life is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Atienza

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this laptop. The design is great. Honestly, I wasn't sure I would like the red keyboard but it is one of my favorite features of the design. It took a little bit of time to get Windows completely updated but once I did the laptop has run flawlessly. It holds up well to all of my college requirements and it runs every game I want it to. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Drage

customer_reviews.title: Great Starting Laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop for gaming and productivity. I run most Triple-A titles at 60 FPS but with the graphic settings on Custom between Low-Medium, and Medium-High it all depends on what the game requires. For Example: Fortnite 50-70 FPS at medium-high settings, Destiny 2 50-70 Fps Medium settings, and CSGO from 80-100 FPS Uncapped on high settings. Overall a great laptop to start off in PC gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Relatively light-weight laptop with great performance. Needed something that I could run different processes at once, and play games on when traveling. Replaced another laptop (not MSI) that took forever to opening and running Access, Excell, and Word. The processing lag did give me an excuse for losing whenever I was playing a game, but the MSI laptop has taken that excuse away.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: DOPE LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: I am actually writing this review from the MSI GV62 right now! The laptop is so sleek and beautiful. It runs games perfectly and has an amazing keyboard because of the Steel Series collab. I definitely recommend this laptop. By writing this review, I am actually about to receive a free steel series headset! SO SICK! LOVE MSI LOVE STEEL SERIES! LOVE GAMING!
customer_reviews.author: Jhugzy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far nothing there isnt one game I throw at it that it cant handle. I play rocket league, fortnite, and smite. Very minimal minimal bloatware. The Intel memory makes it just ass good as an SSD. Boots up in about 8 seconds. Definitely worth Every penny
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Made a huge mistake in buying into this brand
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to find a way to return the laptop i bought just 8 months ago and having lots of trouble with keeping Windows 10 up and running on this MSI laptop. I made a huge mistake in buying into this brand, should have gone for higher end brands like HP or even iMac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Laptop for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The MSI GV62 is an amazing laptop especially when you save 100$. I have tested Skyrim, TERA, ARMA 3, and many more games. They all run smooth with around 40-60+ FPS at all times. The laptop is built very well and has a unique keyboard. It's keyboard is a Steelseries edition and it has a red backlight. It has a cooling booster button to help it from becoming overheated which hasn't even came close for me.
customer_reviews.author: Loran B

customer_reviews.title: I think this laptop is great for a new gamer
customer_reviews.text: I think this laptop is great for a new gamer. It doesn't max out all settings on games but it provides an experience infinitely better than a normal laptop. The first few days I had some issues with the screen not turning on and things not loading that should, but I think it has settled in. Overall, it is a great gaming laptop and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bahemi16

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for expensive laptop
customer_reviews.text: Not a good quality laptop. Information crashed, emailed and called product support with no real fix. Finally had to pay for a drive to reinstall and not sure how long this takes....its been 3 days! They should just send me a new laptop...it is only 4 months old!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: how?  it's 2018!
customer_reviews.text: Comically bad display. Only buy if you are using external monitor. My cheaper laptop from 2009 had a better display. Absurdly bad display for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good price to performance!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this laptop and first impressions are amazing. I have a pretty beefy gaming desktop computer and bought this for on-the-go gaming and it runs all the games I play very smoothly at or above 60 fps. The fans are quiet unless the cooler-boost is enabled and even then the noise is nothing compared to single fanned laptops I have owned in the past. It gets as warm as you would expect but is by no means uncomfortable to use. The screen tilts back far enough to sit on my couch or bed and the viewing angles are pretty decent. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a budget gaming laptop!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gaming on a budget
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was an amazing bang for my buck. I was trying to buy a gaming laptop vs desktop for convenience purposes (bringing it to campus). People were insistent that I couldn't find a laptop comparable to a desktop for gaming but this does everything I could ask. I buy no means am a tech person so specs are a bit over my head. Instead I will say that I can flawlessly run The Witcher 3 with all graphics settings set as high as they go. That's about as good a review as I can give it. No cooling problems either which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cortez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If you value your money, your time, or you sanity, you should steer clear of this laptop at all costs. I had mine for 5 months, with very minimal usage. Mostly used for internet surfing and Microsoft Office. At the 5 month mark, I opened up my computer for some work and was met with the Blue Screen of Death, with no warning up to it. The code was: Critical Process Died. I tried resetting, factory resetting, and every other option that I could and all were met with the same result, "could not complete action". Just do yourself a favor and buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a good budget PC that runs game smooth as hell
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a good budget PC that runs game smooth as hell, look no further. I kept browsing and browsing different laptops and I can tell you so far this is the best choice in laptops. For a good price you're looking to run all current games at High and or ultra graphics. Fast, quiet and so light for a 1050ti.
customer_reviews.author: Mbeach

customer_reviews.title: Better than described, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Mine actually came with a SSD I don't see on the listing. Works great but make sure the msi dragon center software is open when you're gaming because the fans don't work well without it. Runs most MMOs on ultra, plays ARK on lower settings, has some problems with big minecraft mod packs. I'd consider upgrading the RAM.
customer_reviews.author: R Sliffe

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad At All for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, this turned out to be a good bang for the buck for me. I needed a laptop that could handle some heavy lifting graphically that was under $700 max. It could sure use 8gigs of additional RAM, and a 1tb harddrive, but otherwise it can handle the heavy lifting I needed it to handle. The only thing I wasn't too happy about was that the battery life wasn't the greatest, but you can't have it all.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Great budget gaming machine. Put 8 GB more of ram.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid machine. I got it on sale for around $600. I put another 8GB or RAM in it and couldn't be happier. Will it compete with $1500 machines? No. But it has ran everything I have asked it too and smoothly. No real bloat ware. Solid frame. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these. One works fantastic, the other has been a mess from the start. Maybe one came off the production line on a friday?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: now with any gaming notebook there's bound to be flawed its not a desktop after all but MSI always comes through to make it that extra bit closer to being a traditional gaming pc with amazing audio a beefy graphics card and solid storage this is the perfect laptop for those in music production , gaming on the go , and streaming I love this laptop and ill only use MSI products from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J

customer_reviews.title: I judged as a regular laptop not gaming.
customer_reviews.text: So I am new to gaming computers so I really dont know much but I do love this laptop. I usually hate red but I like the keyboard, the letters are big so my clumsy self have less of an issue pressing the wrong keys. The screen is triple what my last one was so I'm in love there. The only issue I'm seeing so far after a day is that the speakers are super quiet but headphones will fix that issue.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: It's nice looks beautiful but bad performance
customer_reviews.text: I just got this laptop about 2 weeks ago and when I wanted turn it on the screen I doesn't turn on but the keyboard it shows light ....and I turn it off and on and it's still not working I don't know what is the problem....
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: A laptop that does not function does me no good
customer_reviews.text: Bought the laptop, thinking I was getting a good deal. Instead, I just got a very expensive paperweight. Died within three months of buying it. I contacted the company for support and I was told this was a problem that they dealt with a lot, and that I should send it in to be repaired. I did so, paying sixty dollars out of my own pocket for the mailing cost. Came back working. Died again within a month. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Inquire more
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this computer on August and its been a painful discovery that it has a faulty hard drive, lost 3 months of work. And again i will lose everything I've done because of errors on my hardrive.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Talavera

customer_reviews.title: A good laptop for a beginner level gamer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a laptop since my old one has finally given up on my after long 4 years. I did a bit of a research and came across this one. I have always heard positive things about MSI laptops and while this one doesn't have a good battery life, it makes it up with great configurations and aesthetics for the money I am paying. It plays some of the decent games giving good FPS and gets my work done which is what I was looking for in a laptop when I was planning to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Ronak

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this PC and experienced blue screens, and then extremely slow performance after rebooting. Eventually got to the point that even when I reinstalled windows it was so slow that there are clearly serious build defects/instabilities on this product. I returned mine and have no regrets, MSI clearly went cheap on this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tong

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, but... Not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Intel optane works weird sometimes, or maybe the hdd came broken, who knows, the thing is, the laptop have many features but the drivers are a mess to kept updated, msi needs to work better in that department... Would recommend?, Yes, but you need and M.2 NVMe for the windows, trust me, don't use intel optane.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Granda

product_meta.title: MSI GV62 8RD-200 15.6" Full HD Performance Gaming Laptop PC i5-8300H, GTX 1050Ti 4G, 8GB RAM, 16GB Intel Optane Memory + 1TB HDD, Win 10 64 bit, Black, Steelseries Red Backlit Keys
product_meta.description:
Style:GTX1050ti |i5| 16GB Otane | 8GB |1TB

MSI 15.6" Performance Gaming Laptop i5-8300H GTX 1050Ti 4G 8GB 16GB Intel OPTANE MEMORY + 1TB HDD Win 10
feature_bullets: Display: 15.6" Full HD EDP IPS-Level | Operating System: Win 10 Multi-language
Processor: New Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8300H 2.3 - 4.0GHz

Special Features: 1 Year Limited warranty (Include 1 Year Global) | Intel Optane Memory (16GB): Launches programs faster, Powers quicker access to files, Loads game levels in an instant.Webcam: HD type (30fps@720p)
Memory: 8GB DDR4 2400MHz 2 Sockets; Max Memory 32GB | Storage: New Intel Optane 16GB + 1TB (5400RPM)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars690 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
